page.title: 13Landscape and Buildings
page.content:
Castle Forbes lies to the east of Keig village amidst wooded policies. Built between 1815 and 1821 it is owned by Malcolm, the Master of Forbes, and occupied by his younger brother, the Hon. Jonathan Forbes, his wife Nicola and their two young daughters.
While not operated as a hotel, the castle is open to paying guests, in particular those from overseas whose ancestors emigrated from the Keig/Alford area and who wish to trace their roots by looking up parish registers and other local records.
